phrases: During the two weeks that Nana was gone,
I took on extra work, so I would be busy every day,
and worked until I was absolutely exhausted.
I did this to keep my mind off of how lonely I was.
Yet I went to the practice sessions at the studio without fail.
Then Nobu would always walk me home.
I had not heard from Takumi at all.
Blinking eyes call the wind
A smile clears all the noise away
The angel in your eyes whispers
Everything begins now
Can you feel it now Can you feel it now
It is like being caught in a wave
Pulling on my heart Pulling on my heart
Breath held, arms reaching out
Baby this world is different from yesterday's
You are the only one I can see
Baby my wish on a wing
This sky is torn
By a single overflowing word
I am thinking about going on a trip.
Hey, that sounds nice.
Buy me a gift from wherever you are going.
I am finished.
Where do you want to go?
Go on your own.
You might have the time, but I am busy.
Take some time off work.
We have an important concert coming up,
so I hafta practice every day.
What is that?
Are you on the pill again?
It is your fault!
If you want a child that badly,
have some other woman give birth to one for you.
You do not mind if I slept with another woman?
You are such a cold woman.
You just realized that now?
I am going to go write a song.
For the cute Reira.
Oh, Shin.
You are awake.
Good morning, Miss Ryoko.
I will be flying out again tomorrow.
To the States.
So I will not be seeing you for a while.
But I will bring back a bunch of gifts.
You can keep your hopes high.
So you will be going.
I will be lonely without you, Miss Ryoko.
Oh, my.
You are not only good with your technique,
you have also improved your choice of words.
Perhaps it is due to my great teaching skills.
I am grateful.
Thanks to you, business is thriving.
I have turned an angel into a devil.
Upon a closer look,
I guess you do not look much like her, after all.
Huh?
What?
No.
Nothing.
Seconds please?
Yasu!
Long time no see.
You have not changed one bit.
Mhm.
Mhm.
Oh, stout beer please.
How are you doing?
I am glad to finally meet up with you.
That is because you keep pestering me.
I invited Reira too, but she is back in her hometown.
She really wanted to come.
Is that so?
By the way, Naoki, your voice is too loud.
You are a celebrity now,
so you would be wise to keep a low profile.
Not to worry.
The customers here are all from the entertainment industry.
Really?
By the way, Yasu, I heard you came to Tokyo to go pro.
Reira was complaining that she is not happy with your decision.
Yeah, I guessed as much.
That is why I do not want to meet her.
She will keep on teasing me about it.
Well, of course she would tease you.
What in the world happened to make you change your mind?
Let us see.
You could say I feel responsible for the band like it is my child.
What is that supposed to mean?
You really have not changed, Yasu.
You need to let it all out sometimes.
Go wild for a change.
Though I suggest not becoming as violent as Takumi.
When he loses it, he becomes a criminal.
Although he is been quite calm as of late,
perhaps from fear of becoming the next gossip item.
Back in junior high school,
none of the windows had glass because of him.
Yeah, I remember that.
Speaking of Takumi,
I cannot reach him on his cell phone.
What is he up to?
I do not know, but...
He is probably visiting women, one after another.
There is no need to worry about him.
Is that so?
Reira, what are you doing?
Visiting my hometown.
Oh right.
Of course.
You startled me.
How long have you been here?
Thirty minutes.
Huh?!
I have been here staring at you like this for thirty minutes,
but you did not notice me at all, Takumi.
It is got me exhausted.
No, I meant how long have you been in town.
Anyway, if you have been staring at me,
the least you could do is say something!
I have been here for three days.
I was visiting mother's grave just now.
But your mother is still alive.
Your mother, Takumi.
Due to work, you could not be here for the ceremony
marking seven years after her passing,
so I prayed that she may warmly protect her careless son
from the wrath of the gods.
Well, thanks for that.
Is your father doing okay?
Maybe I should go and say hi.
Do not bother.
He is the same as always, drinking from early in the day.
That is got to be tough for your elder sister and her husband.
With a little brother like this on top of it.
You know, if you are going to worry about someone,
worry about your own mother!
Leaving her alone way out here in the countryside.
But she says she does not want to go to Tokyo.
She really likes this place.
I do not get it.
What is so good about this place way out in the country?
Especially given the fact she lived in New York at one point.
Is not that why?
Living abroad did not suit her at all.
I have been telling her Tokyo is not a foreign country.
But I kind of miss New York.
It is my birthplace after all.
Why not go there?
Though we only have two more days off.
You should have gone.
Hmm...
But I had a number of things to do.
Besides, we all should pay our respects to our parents once in a while.
We came so close on our tour the other day,
but I could not visit because of our tight schedule.
What about you, Takumi?
As long as I stay in Tokyo, I end up working.
So I thought I would wander off to the country.
Call it an escape.
But I cannot keep my mind off work, so I will be returning now.
I just stopped by here for a bit.
Huh, you are going back?!
We got to meet here, so why not have some fun together?
Give me a break.
Give me a chance to be alone on our off days.
See ya.
Oh, Reira...
We have got a photo shoot for a magazine next week,
so do not get tanned.
I am aware of that, leader.
What is that guy doing?
Their free time is coming to an end.
But I did not contact him, either.
Why did not you?
You have got no reason to hold back.
You should send him a bunch of emails daily and keep his mind on you.
But I do not want to contact him only to be ignored.
He may be in less of a position to contact you
once they are back to work.
Yes.
But it is okay if that is how it goes.
Yasu!
Are not you worried about Hachi?!
Do not you get the urge to call Takumi and give him an earful?!
Sure.
But I cannot get through to him on his cell.
Nana!
If he came to see me because someone around him told him to,
that is not going to make me too happy!
I really am fine, so do not worry!
The way I said that...
to them it probably sounds like I am trying to be strong about this.
But the honest truth is,
if Takumi were to never call me again,
I would be fine with that.
Or in fact, it would be better that way.
Hachi!
Buy one for me too!
Buy it yourself.
What should I get?
Thank you.
You know, Nana's singing seems to be improving day by day,
do not you think?
Maybe because of the sit-ups.
I am sure we would be able to go pro, right?
Trapnest will be on their break for two more days.
If I do not hear from Takumi again,
I can become the poor girl
who was tricked and dumped by a nasty guy.
I can make it all Takumi's fault, and move on to a new love.
But if he found out about my cunning thoughts,
he will end up hating me.
First of all, I would be dreaming
to think someone would make me their girlfriend
because Takumi dumped me.
I do not want Nobu thinking I am such an easy woman.
But the fact is, I am that type of woman.
A black four-wheel drive Mercedes Benz.
Nobu!
Thank you for walking me home.
Huh?
I will be fine on my own from here on.
I am almost home.
I am sorry for having you take a longer route home
to walk me home every day.
No, I do not mind it.
If you are bothered by it,
I will have Shin or Yasu walk you home from tomorrow...
No, it does not bother me.
Nana!
If he is going to come at this stage,
he could have sent me an email ahead of time.
Such a selfish man who makes decisions on a whim.
Well, well.
It is you.
Where were you this late at night?
I worry, you know.
I have been waiting for an hour.
Ah, sorry.
I was at the studio to see Nana and her band practice.
Nana's staying with Ren now,
so Nobu walked me home because I am afraid to walk home alone.
Is that so?
Well, thank you very much for that.
Okay, then.
Thank you, Nobu.
Good night.
I am the worst.
Sorry for coming like this outta the blue.
I left my place without my cell phone and came here before returning,
so I could not call you.
This is what happens when I think cunning thoughts
and take advantage of someone is kindness
by having him walk me home.
I must have really hurt his feelings.
What am I going to do?
I cannot go to the studio anymore.
I will not be able to look him in the eye!
Oh, Takumi, want me to make you something?
Are you hungry?
No.
Then, do you want something to drink?
There is cold beer.
Sure.
I must not let my guard down.
To Takumi, I am nothing but a convenient woman
who will sleep with him when he wants to do it.
It is one thing to get involved once or twice,
but this is the third time.
If I do not put a stop to this,
this pathetic relationship may continue on.
If I am going to end this, I have got to do it now.
Before it is too late.
I just hafta tell him never to come here again.
But...
am I able to say such a thing?
I cannot say it.
Why are you drinking on your own?
Give me some.
I know he is not that great a guy.
So why cannot I... end it?
Do not!
What are you watching?!
Erotic videos.
I am studying.
Cut it out.
Not at a time like this.
Are you doing it to make fun of me?
I cannot take it anymore.
Take what?
What is the matter?
Nothing!
It is none of your business!
Um, sorry.
Please leave me alone.
Shin.
A man and a woman are simply opposing creatures
driven toward each other by lust.
Can they be connected by love?
Sorry, I do not know either.
The truth is, I am just a girl who wanted to get close
to Trapnest's Takumi outta curiosity.
I am not as pure as Nana thinks.
And I am sure I am different from the ideal Nobu pictures me as.
But Takumi understands me... me who is helplessly empty.
And me too.
I know Takumi is a pathetic man.
Nana...
It is strange.
He lived in a world farthest away from mine.
But only Takumi...
will forgive me for who I am.
As if he was the sole accomplice to my actions.
Thanks for your concerns about everything.
THANKS FOR YOUR CONCERN ABOUT EVERYTHING.
TAKUMI CAME BY LAST NIGHT, AND SAYS HE WILL BE WITH ME ALL DAY TOMORROW, UNTIL THE END OF HIS BREAK.
BUT I HAVE WORK.
I SHOULD HAVE TAKEN THE DAY OFF.
Thanks for your concerns
THANKS FOR YOUR CONCERN ABOUT EVERYTHING.
TAKUMI CAME BY LAST NIGHT, AND SAYS HE WILL BE WITH ME ALL DAY TOMORROW, UNTIL THE END OF HIS BREAK.
BUT I HAVE WORK.
I SHOULD HAVE TAKEN THE DAY OFF.
THANKS FOR YOUR CONCERN ABOUT EVERYTHING.
TAKUMI CAME BY LAST NIGHT, AND SAYS HE WILL BE WITH ME ALL DAY TOMORROW, UNTIL THE END OF HIS BREAK.
BUT I HAVE WORK.
I SHOULD HAVE TAKEN THE DAY OFF.
Takumi came by last night,
THANKS FOR YOUR CONCERN ABOUT EVERYTHING.
TAKUMI CAME BY LAST NIGHT, AND SAYS HE WILL BE WITH ME ALL DAY TOMORROW, UNTIL THE END OF HIS BREAK.
BUT I HAVE WORK.
I SHOULD HAVE TAKEN THE DAY OFF.
and says he will be with me
THANKS FOR YOUR CONCERN ABOUT EVERYTHING.
TAKUMI CAME BY LAST NIGHT, AND SAYS HE WILL BE WITH ME ALL DAY TOMORROW, UNTIL THE END OF HIS BREAK.
BUT I HAVE WORK.
I SHOULD HAVE TAKEN THE DAY OFF.
until the end of his break.
But I have work.
I should have taken the day off.
WHAT TIME DO YOU THINK YOU CAN MAKE IT HOME, NANA?
WITH THE LIVE CONCERT COMING UP, I DO NOT WANT TO GET IN THE WAY OF YOUR PRACTICE, SO I WILL NOT BE DROPPING BY THE STUDIO.
GOOD LUCK.
But I have work.
I should have taken the day off.
WHAT TIME DO YOU THINK YOU CAN MAKE IT HOME, NANA?
WITH THE LIVE CONCERT COMING UP, I DO NOT WANT TO GET IN THE WAY OF YOUR PRACTICE, SO I WILL NOT BE DROPPING BY THE STUDIO.
GOOD LUCK.
WHAT TIME DO YOU THINK YOU CAN MAKE IT HOME, NANA?
WITH THE LIVE CONCERT COMING UP, I DO NOT WANT TO GET IN THE WAY OF YOUR PRACTICE, SO I WILL NOT BE DROPPING BY THE STUDIO.
GOOD LUCK.
What time do you think you can make it home, Nana?
WHAT TIME DO YOU THINK YOU CAN MAKE IT HOME, NANA?
WITH THE LIVE CONCERT COMING UP, I DO NOT WANT TO GET IN THE WAY OF YOUR PRACTICE, SO I WILL NOT BE DROPPING BY THE STUDIO.
GOOD LUCK.
WHAT TIME DO YOU THINK YOU CAN MAKE IT HOME, NANA?
WITH THE LIVE CONCERT COMING UP, I DO NOT WANT TO GET IN THE WAY OF YOUR PRACTICE, SO I WILL NOT BE DROPPING BY THE STUDIO.
GOOD LUCK.
With the live concert coming up,
WHAT TIME DO YOU THINK YOU CAN MAKE IT HOME, NANA?
WITH THE LIVE CONCERT COMING UP, I DO NOT WANT TO GET IN THE WAY OF YOUR PRACTICE, SO I WILL NOT BE DROPPING BY THE STUDIO.
GOOD LUCK.
I do not want to get in the way of your practice,
WHAT TIME DO YOU THINK YOU CAN MAKE IT HOME, NANA?
WITH THE LIVE CONCERT COMING UP, I DO NOT WANT TO GET IN THE WAY OF YOUR PRACTICE, SO I WILL NOT BE DROPPING BY THE STUDIO.
GOOD LUCK.
so I will not be dropping by the studio.
Good luck.
Give my best to everyone.
Hachiko.
GIVE MY BEST TO EVERYONE.
HACHIKO.
Give my best to everyone.
Hachiko.
Trapnest's time off came to an end,
but Nana did not come home.
I simply assumed she was with Ren.
I wanted to at least drop by the studio and see Nana.
But I did not because I did not have the guts to see Nobu.
As usual Takumi did not send me a single email.
But surprisingly, I accepted that with an open mind,
casually thinking he will eventually come to see me again.
I could not tell if that was a feeling of trust or resignation.
Misato!
Thank you for coming all the way out to pick me up, Miss Komatsu.
It is not a problem.
And call me Hachiko.
That is such a cute nickname.
We still have time before the concert,
so why do not we go home first so you can leave your bags?
I will carry one.
Thank you so much.
Is it really okay to stay at your place again?
Mhm.
You can stay for as many nights as you wish.
It is summer vacation, so you have free time, do not you?
Yes.
To be honest, I would love to spend all of my summer vacation here,
but I could not possibly impose on you for a full month.
That is totally okay with me!
Then spend your whole summer vacation here!
Or rather, I want you to stay!
Are you sure?
I am thrilled!
I am just as glad about it.
- Nana's staying with Ren... - A train will be arriving on track one.
and shows no sign of returning.
- I was feeling all lonely living alone.
- Please stay inside the yellow line.
You know, I still cannot get over the excitement
after learning that Nana and Ren are all lovey-dovey.
I carelessly blurted it out.
I assumed you would already know.
But I did secretly find out when they were back in my hometown
that the two were living together.
I have been wondering what had happened between them after that,
so this news is such a relief to me.
Please do not tell anyone, okay?
Rest assured.
Please have faith in me, Miss Hachiko.
The concert starts at seven, right?
I cannot wait to see the band members.
I wonder if they are still rehearsing.
Actually, I have not seen them for a week.
But I thought you visited the studio every day to see them practice.
Well, yeah, but...
I did not want to bother them so close to their live performance.
I see.
You are right.
Let us hope that BLAST's professional debut becomes a reality.
Mhm.
If I were to see Nobu today, what expression should I make?
Nobu may never smile for me again.
That thought almost made me cry.
That other night, when Nana sang that song that Nobu wrote.
She was wishing for something as she sang it with such passion...
so her voice would reach me.
Right now, I realize what she was wishing.
I reached into the sky
But I could not reach what I wanted
They grew smaller and disappeared into the sky
Like colorful balloons
I am alone
My hand had no place to go
And gently you took it
Starless night
I will not look back at the shadow of my past
I want to feel your warmth
Tears are falling down
Even if I am unsure I will not let go
Of your hand holding mine
